text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Congo withdrew its diplomatic recognition of Polisario's self-proclaimed Democratic Sahraoui Arab Republic.
ALMAGHRIB - Moroccan people gives huge "yes" for constitutional reforms called by King Hassan.
- Interior Minister Driss Basri says U.N. referendum in Western Sahara must be held.
- Moroccan officials had contacts with Polisario in Rabat. Any solution must be set in framework of Moroccan territorial integrity and sovereignty.
- More than 99 percent vote "Yes" for constitutional referendum.
